meanings.definition: Balletomanes: enthusiasts or fans of ballet
meanings.sent1: The balletomanes eagerly awaited the new ballet season.
meanings.sent2: Many balletomanes traveled far to see their favorite ballet company perform.
meanings.sent3: The balletomanes were so excited about the ballet, they started dancing in the lobby.
meanings.sent4: Her love for ballet was like a fire burning inside, just like the balletomanes.
meanings.sent5: The balletomanes' passion for ballet was as bright as the stage lights.

meanings.definition: Balletomanes: those who are passionate about ballet performances
meanings.sent1: The balletomanes applauded loudly after the breathtaking ballet performance.
meanings.sent2: You could see the joy on the faces of the balletomanes as they watched the dancers.
meanings.sent3: The balletomanes couldn't stop talking about the ballet; they were truly obsessed!
meanings.sent4: Their dedication to ballet was unwavering, just like true balletomanes.
meanings.sent5: The balletomanes' hearts danced along with the performers on stage.
